H0.text: Who, in November 2005, became the first ever female Chancellor of Germany. Angela Davis

H1.text: Who, in November 2005, became the first ever female Chancellor of Germany. Ursula von der Leyen

H2.text: Who, in November 2005, became the first ever female Chancellor of Germany. Claudia Roth

H3.text: Who, in November 2005, became the first ever female Chancellor of Germany. Merkel

A4.text: Angela Merkel served as Chancellor of Germany from 2005 to 2021.
